hero.title: FREELANCE
hero.subtitle: DEVOPS . SRE
hero.description: Hi, I'm Edwin Istin, DevOps Expert with 8+ years of experience helping tech companies overcome infrastructure challenges with personalized and efficient solutions.

infrastructure.title: Infrastructure as Code (IaC)
infrastructure.description: Save time and avoid manual errors with fully coded infrastructure management. Terraform modules, Terragrunt organization, and Ansible for idempotent resource deployment.

cicd.title: DevOps & CI/CD
cicd.description: Simplify and automate your deployment processes for faster and secure application delivery. GitLab CI, GitHub Actions, GitOps (ArgoCD, FluxCD), Docker, Kubernetes, and Helm.

kubernetes.title: Site Reliability Engineering (SRE)
kubernetes.description: Keep control of your performance with proactive monitoring and reliability indicators. Prometheus, Grafana, Loki, Victoria Metrics, and application SLO setup.

cloud.title: Google Cloud Platform (GCP)
cloud.description: Design and implement custom cloud architectures that adapt to your current and future needs. GCP architecture definition, Kubernetes migration, and cost optimization.

recentWork.title: RECENT WORK
recentWork.pageDescription: Explore all of my recent DevOps and infrastructure projects. Each project showcases different technologies and solutions for modern cloud architecture.
recentWork.ctaDescription: Let's discuss how I can help you build robust, scalable infrastructure for your applications.

kubernetes.title: GCP INFRASTRUCTURE FROM SCRATCH
kubernetes.description: Built scalable infrastructure from scratch at Teester startup. Created secure network architecture, implemented Terraform modules, and achieved zero-downtime migration from legacy infrastructure.

cicd.title: PROJECT AUDIT & STARTER KIT
cicd.description: Audited 100+ L'Oréal Paris projects and created standardized starter kit with 15 Terraform modules and 4 boilerplate projects for rapid project deployment with best practices.

cloud.title: KUBERNETES MIGRATION AT SCALE
cloud.description: Led migration from legacy Compute Instances to GKE at Le Monde. Managed 15+ clusters across multiple newspaper titles, implemented monitoring stack with Prometheus/Grafana/Loki.

monitoring.title: MONITORING STACK SETUP
monitoring.description: Implemented comprehensive monitoring solution with Prometheus, Grafana, and AlertManager. Created custom dashboards and alerting rules for production environments.

security.title: SECURITY HARDENING PROJECT
security.description: Enhanced infrastructure security with Vault integration, RBAC policies, and network security measures. Achieved SOC2 compliance requirements.

automation.title: INFRASTRUCTURE AUTOMATION
automation.description: Built end-to-end infrastructure automation using Ansible and Terraform. Reduced manual deployment time by 90% with CI/CD pipeline integration.

stories.title: STORIES
stories.subtitle: Insights, tutorials, and thoughts on DevOps, cloud infrastructure, and automation best practices.
stories.newsletterDescription: Get the latest DevOps insights delivered to your inbox

landing.title: CREATE A LANDING PAGE THAT PERFORMS GREAT
landing.description: Discover the essential techniques and strategies for creating landing pages that not only look great but also convert visitors into customers. Learn about performance optimization, user experience, and conversion rate optimization.

career1.title: STARTING AND GROWING A CAREER IN WEB DESIGN
career1.description: Essential tips and strategies for building a successful career in web design and development.

career2.title: STARTING AND GROWING A CAREER IN WEB DESIGN
career2.description: Essential tips and strategies for building a successful career in web design and development.

about.title: ABOUT ME
about.description: I'm Edwin Istin, a passionate DevOps engineer with over 8 years of experience in crafting reliable and scalable infrastructure solutions. My journey began with discovering containerization technologies like LXC and Docker, which sparked my deep curiosity for the DevOps world. I've since developed extensive expertise in Kubernetes, Cloud Platforms (especially GCP), and Infrastructure-as-Code tools like Terraform and Ansible. I thrive on solving complex infrastructure challenges and helping companies scale efficiently.

contact.title: CONTACT ME
contact.heading: SCALE YOUR INFRASTRUCTURE TO THE NEXT LEVEL
contact.description: Ready to eliminate deployment headaches and scale with confidence? Let's discuss your infrastructure challenges and build a solution that grows with your business.
